entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, whose broomstick is seen rising towards the Forbidden Forest.

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: A teacher who is tending to Neville's injury and taking him to the hospital wing.

entities.name: neville longbottom
entities.description: A student in Harry's class who has broken his wrist during a flying lesson.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student who is laughing at Neville's misfortune.

entities.name: parvati patil
entities.description: A Gryffindor student who tells Malfoy to shut up.

entities.name: pansy parkinson
entities.description: A Slytherin girl who teases Parvati for sticking up for Neville.

relationships.description: Madam Hooch is taking care of Neville's injury and helping him to the hospital wing.
Parvati is defending Neville from Malfoy's teasing.
Madam Hooch is in charge of the class and Harry is a student under her authority.
Neville is receiving care from Madam Hooch.
Malfoy is attacking Parvati for sticking up for Neville.
Pansy is teasing Parvati for defending Neville.
